text: @GovRonDeSantis You honestly thought FL of all places was going to elude the ‘Rona. We knew you did. Pride goeth before the fall. Try not to chock on those Trump boots. And mask up, dough boy. 😷 #Covididiots #FL #COVID19 #TrumpFailedAmerica
